entry.string: If this is your first visit to this part of your Xaraya site, please take a minute to read through the following introduction, in order to explore the different possibilities offered by the Contact module.
entry.translation: Iff thees is yuoor furst feesit tu thees pert ooff yuoor Xereya seete-a, pleese-a teke-a a meenoote-a tu reed thruoogh zee fullooeeng intrudoocshun, in oorder tu ixplure-a zee deefffferent pusseebilities ooffffered by zee Cuntect mudoole-a.

entry.string: The contact module gives your users a way to contact members of your company or development staff by listing a business card type of display for each person that you enter through the contact persons area of administration. The user can also send an email to the contact person via a web based form using Xaraya's mail module.
entry.translation: Zee cuntect mudoole-a geefes yuoor users a vey tu cuntect meemburs ooff yuoor cumpuny oor defelupment steffff by leesting a booseeness cerd type-a ooff deespley fur iech persun thet yuoo inter thruoogh zee cuntect persuns erea ooff edmeenistreshun. Zee user cun elsu send un imeeel tu zee cuntect persun feea a veb besed furm useeng Xereye's meeel mudoole-a.

entry.string: From the menu, you have a few choices. I would suggest starting from the first option and work your way down.
entry.translation: Frum zee menoo, yuoo hefe-a a foo chueeces. I vuoold sooggest sterteeng frum zee furst oopshun und vurk yuoor vey doon. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: "Add Company". From this menu option, you can update the necessary contact information for your company,"NOTE:" In this version of contact you will need to give write permissions to your /modules/contact/xarimages directory so that you may upload a company logo. From here work your way down the list and add cities, locations, departments as necessary, some default items have already been added to the database, feel free to change them.
entry.translation: "Edd Cumpuny". Frum thees menoo oopshun, yuoo cun updete-a zee necessery cuntect inffurmeshun fur yuoor cumpuny,"NOTE:" In thees ferseeun ooff cuntect yuoo veell need tu geefe-a vreete-a permeessiuns tu yuoor /mudooles/cuntect/xereemeges durectury su thet yuoo mey uplued a cumpuny lugu. Frum here-a vurk yuoor vey doon zee leest und edd ceeties, luceshuns, depertments es necessery, sume-a deffoolt items hefe-a elreedy beee edded tu zee detebese-a, feel free-a tu chunge-a zeem.

entry.string: "Add Contacts" Here you can add contact persons for your company. The information that is added here, is what will be displayed on the business card page. Again to upload a picture for the contact, you will need to give write permission to the /modules/contact/xarimages directory.
entry.translation: "Edd Cuntects" Here-a yuoo cun edd cuntect persuns fur yuoor cumpuny. Bork bork bork! Zee inffurmeshun thet is edded here-a, is vhet veell be-a deespleyed oon zee booseeness cerd pege-a. Egeeen tu uplued a peectoore-a fur zee cuntect, yuoo veell need tu geefe-a vreete-a permeessiun tu zee /mudooles/cuntect/xereemeges durectury.

entry.string: The Contact Module has no blocks included at this time.
entry.translation: Zee Cuntect Mudoole-a hes nu blucks inclooded et thees teeme-a.
